name: Isaiah's Basics 1 Year Celebration!
description:
HOORAY! ISAIAH'S BASICS, MY FIRST MOD, IS TURNING 1 YEAR OLD TODAY! And Isaiah want's to celebrate that by organizing a party! But unfortunately, they don't have any supplies to set it up! All you have to do, is collect all 7 party supplies and win!

Isaiah's Basics: https://al-al.itch.io/isaiahs-basics-in-math-and-fun

Baldi's Basics http://mystman12.itch.io/baldis-basics

Baldi's Basics Birthday Bash: https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics-birthday-bash

AumSum Over BF: https://al-al.itch.io/aumsum-over-bf-fnf-mod
